data.title: Mandiant spikes 16% on report Google is in talks to acquire the company
data.description: Shares of Mandiant, a $4.5 billion cybersecurity firm, closed up 16% after a report said Google is interested in acquiring the company.

data.title: More than $1 billion could be forfeited in health-care flexible spending accounts this year
data.description: At companies that offer a 2.5-month grace period to spend the previous year's unused funds, the deadline is March 15.

data.title: Moderna reaches preliminary agreement to build Covid vaccine manufacturing plant in Africa
data.description: Moderna could fill Covid vaccine doses at the Kenya facility as early as 2023 subject to demand, according to the company.

data.title: Investing Club: We're adding to a health stock in Monday's market slide — here's what else we're watching
data.description: With another rough day in the markets unfolding, we want to put a small amount of money to work in quality companies.

data.title: Levi Strauss suspends sales in Russia amid Ukraine war
data.description: The apparel company will also donate more than $300,000 to nonprofit organizations aiding Eastern European refugees.

data.title: Uber raises first-quarter outlook on strong ridership rebound
data.description: The company said mobility demand has improved "significantly" through February.

data.title: Netflix quits Russia and TikTok won't allow new posts
data.description: Netflix and TikTok are suspending all or part of their services in Russia, adding to a long list of companies boycotting the country over its war in Ukraine.

data.author: Adam Majendie
data.title: These Are the Companies Cutting Ties With Russia Over Ukraine
data.description: These Are the Companies Cutting Ties With Russia Over Ukraine

data.title: Bed Bath & Beyond shares surge 65% after GameStop chairman reveals big stake, pushes turnaround
data.description: Bed Bath & Beyond surged after GameStop Chairman Ryan Cohen revealed he had a nearly 10% stake in the retailer, through his investment company RC Ventures.
